short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you count your CPS and much more !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is my first extension on chrome, so basically, it lets you know how many times you can click in a certain amount of time and at the end, you get your CPS (Clicks per seconds) and how many times you clicked. There are also other options like "hide clicks" which hide the click counter from the user so they can only know their score at the end. Furthermore, there is a little objective system letting you put in a click goal to hit. That is pretty much it for this small extension who, however, will entertain in addition to inform you about your CPS
